in materials needed yarn weight 4 e g alize superlana midi yardage 140m - 150m 150 yds - 165 yds double-stranded weight 2 e g schachenmayr baby smiles bravo baby 185 yardage 310m - 330m 340 yds - 360 yds hook 5 mm crochet hook scissors needle for weaving in ends abbreviations chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet blo - back loop only flo - front loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch st / sts - stitch / stitches pattern notes the pattern is written for a rather long version of the fingerless gloves chain 50 to adjust the length simply add or subtract from the starting chain work a loose chain at the end of each row to ensure the edges remain stretchy special techniques half_double_crochet ribbing working half_double_crochet in the blo except for the first and last stitch of each row which are worked through both loops working into the 3rd loop bump of the starting chain pattern instructions chain 50 + 1 turn row 1 half_double_crochet into the back bump of each chain across 50 sts chain 1 turn row 2-16 half_double_crochet in the first st blo half_double_crochet across until 1 st remains half_double_crochet in the last st 50 sts chain 1 turn joining fold the panel lengthwise to form a tube you will now slip_stitch both edges together to close the glove leaving a gap for the thumb step 1 begin seaming insert your hook into the flo of the last st of the final row and the blo of the corresponding st on the opposite side slip_stitch through both loops repeat for the next 8 sts step 2 create the thumb opening slip_stitch 8 sts along only one side this creates the thumbhole skip these 8 sts on the opposite side do not work into them step 3 continue seaming resume slip stitching both edges together using the same method insert your hook into the flo of the next st on the side closest to you insert your hook into the blo of the corresponding st on the opposite side slip_stitch through both loops repeat until the seam is complete finishing chain 1 fasten o� and weave in the ends securely congratulations you ve completed your simple fingerless glove now go ahead and make it a pair if you share your finished simple fingerless gloves on social
